points.title: Personalized
points.desc: Your goals shape the lessons. Whether it’s business English, career coaching, or casual conversation, we adjust the curriculum as we go—designed around your style, timeline, and needs. The focus is always on what matters most to you.

points.title: Career-Oriented
points.desc: Real-world business insight from my background in HR, team management, recruitment, L&D, and IT. With an MBA and experience with international teams, I connect learning to the workplace situations you face — interviews, presentations, communication, and career growth.

points.title: Cultural
points.desc: International experience you can relate with. I grew up in a multicultural Asian-American family, studied in Europe, and have lived in Japan for over a decade. I’ve also hired, trained, and managed 400+ staff from 50+ countries. Lessons go beyond English to cover how we communicate across cultures.

points.title: Approachable
points.desc: People-first. I prioritize your experience and enjoyment so lessons stay motivating, even when they’re challenging. With over 10 years in education, I know how to adapt to different learning levels and styles — keeping sessions supportive, flexible, and tailored to you.
